Transaction facts

Designing fee disclosures for prepaid cards

Consumer Financial Protection Bureau (CFPB) Â·

Making the fine print behind prepaid cards easier to understand [no pun intended].

Read a 0-minute case study

Prepaid cards are like not quite like gift cards, not quite like credit or debit cards either. Either way, they've become popular, both for consumers and industry. They are an unregulated financial product, and make industry a lot of money with undisclosed and intentionally confusing fees.

The CFPB is working on an upcoming rule to protect consumers from deceptive practices in the prepaid cards industry. As a user experience designer, I helped prototype and test a model form that would encourage consumers to comparison shop and stay away from shady deals.
